1.content: Ares, the Greek god of war, was making endless wars all around Greece. He was encouraging the fighting because he draws his powers with death and bloodshed and so does Hades and Poseidon (with the navy ships attacking and grant him many favors). When the other 9 Olympians argued about Ares' endless wars Hades and Poseidon defended Ares by stating that his wars are also helping other Gods not only him. Ares then devised an excellent plan to please more gods. Hebe, goddess of youth, the city-states needed more troops so the woman started to give large amounts of babies. This pleased her. To keep troops from getting insane about the wars they started to play music to keep them calm and Apollo enjoyed it. Troops send in woman spies to receive information. But, they are beautiful woman and whoever was in their way (men only) they always had sex with them to get the wanted information. Aphrodite was satisfied with the love going about and especially in these hard times. troops then hunted lots of animals and worshiped greatly to Artemis, the goddess of the Hunt, and gave her pieces of the animals to her offerings. Then better armor and weapons was being forged to protect and attack the city-state troops and praised Hephaestus for their weapons and armor. Hermes being upset that he was consecutively escorting people to the underworld and was getting tired. But the armies was pulling pranks on the other armies and Hermes being a prankster enjoyed as well. Hera the goddess of marriage enjoyed that many militia men were getting married and starting families to grow their city-states. Zeus and Athena still wasn't satisfied.

11.content:
With The Great Wars going on the gods had another meeting to convince Ares to stop this nightmare."Ares, my son, these wars are killing our worshipers please you must stop this madness" Zeus plead to Ares."Sorry father but this wars are helping the others gods not only me and the other gods will protect me from YOU AND ATHENA!!!" Ares responded. Ares then stood up from his throne and left. Athena then stood up and went after her brother to persuade him to end this bloodshed. Zeus then turned his attention to the other gods. "Brothers and sisters how DARE you turn against MY will and Olympus for this evil corrupt god!!!"Zeus shouted. Then a large arguement broke out about the war and Ares benefiting the other gods. Swears were being thrown back and forth.

*********Meanwhile*********

Athena found Ares "Ares, my brother, please you must end this fighting, Zeus' anger with you is raising higher and higher, please you must stop or something bad will happen to you and all Olympus."Athena plead. Ares responded "Athena this is my power , my power draws from the stench of rotting corpses, the spray of blood in the air, and the flags raising in conquered cities." Athena in a sexy voice "Are you sure you there isn't anything I can do to stop this madness?" Ares replied "Yes you can make me change my mind" Athena said" I'll see you when all the gods are asleep." Ares cracked a half simile. and Athena left. Soon Ares came back to the meeting to announce the news. "Brothers, Sisters Athena has convinced me to rethink about the fate of the Great Wars." silent and surprised was in the room "We will discuss the terms tonight and the the fate will be revealed tomorrow."
11.title: The Next Meeting

14.content: Finally, the Great Wars has ended by the singing of a major peace treaty. Ares now satisfied on what the wars had brought him and the other gods lies contemptibly on Olympus. Cities now rebuilding themselves, babies being born, more military men, and so forth. Zeus confronts Athena in the Council Throne Room (which is just a large circular room with Chairs for every Olympians and a large floating orb that shows the whole world). He then tells her "These Great Wars has finally ended and mankind suffered great losses and many disasters happened.""Yes they have father "Athena replied."It is likely that another war will happen especially in a times like this or after the RECONSTRUCTION finishes" Zeus said. Athena replied " The Sisters of Fate have predicted another was coming off the horizon.""We must kill Ares and in hope all and every war will stop and peace will reign all across the land" Said Zeus.Athena "Yes we shall and peace will reign."
